name: Forsaken Frede
description:
You an your class mates dabble in the dark arts.

You have decided to sacrifice Frede the annoying class nerd to pass the final exam.

Unfortunatly the ritual went wrong and frede is now possesed by a demon.

He is even more annoying than usual so you decide to do an exorcism.

Use the color sensor to find the demon in Frede with your friends.

If one of the players find their color the sensor will start to spin.

The more players that find the right color the more the sensor spins.

when all players have found their color the sensor will spin the most and a win screen will appear.
